explains: adv. 极大地，深刻地；严重地，完全地

sentences.en: We are profoundly affected by what happens to us in childhood.
sentences.cn: 童年发生的事深深地影响着我们。

sentences.en: With stunning speed, the Internet is profoundly changing the way we work, shop, do business, and communicate.
sentences.cn: 互联网正以惊人的速度，深远地改变着我们工作、购物、做生意和交流的方式。
她现在几乎一点声音都听不到了。
